name: Philippine Airlines A350 BUSINESS CLASS 16+ Hours - Manila to New York
description:
Philippine Airlines A350 Business Class is in a class of its own! The Ultra Long-haul service from Manila to New York was the perfect way to get back from my trip on United's Island Hopper flight! 

I polled the subscribers to this channel to ask for suggestions, and Philippine Airlines new A350 service from Manila to New York was the winner.

I couldn't have been happier flying on PAL.

In this video, we'll explore what it's like to fly on Philippine Airlines' Business Class in their flagship A350. This route from Manila to New York is currently the eighth longest flight in the world earning a spot as one of the true "Ultra Long-Haul" routes.

The 16+ hours spent in the air on Philippine Airlines A350 Business Class gave me plenty of time to check out the lounge, seat, inflight entertainment, food, and service. I'll even rate them all at the end and compare them to other flights I've taken. 

Special thanks to @the_aviator717yt on Instagram for the PAL photo in the thumbnail! https://www.instagram.com/the_aviator717yt/

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
https://www.youtube.com/jebbrooksflies

Here's a link to the complete and unedited takeoff and landing:
https://youtu.be/KdbvS_ZdxaA

Check me out on Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooksflies/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music:
Weavers - Ciaran Delany
Faster Car (Acoustic Version) - Loving Caliber
Acoustic Dreams 8 - Orjan Karlsson
Delicate Acoustics 19 - Orjan Karlsson
Setting the Table - Isobelle Walton
New York City (Instrumental Version) - Francis Wells
